extension.description: Linting support for python files using `pylint`.
settings.args.description: Arguments passed in. Each argument is a separate string in the array.
settings.severity.description: Mapping from severity of `pylint` message type to severity shown in problem window.
settings.path.description: When set to a path to `pylint` binary, extension will use that for linting. NOTE: Using this option may slowdown linting.
settings.ignorePatterns.description: Patterns used to exclude files or folders from being linted.
settings.importStrategy.description: Defines where `pylint` is imported from. This setting may be ignored if `pylint.path` is set.
settings.importStrategy.useBundled.descr: Always use the bundled version of `pylint`.
Use `pylint` from environment, fallback to bundled version only if `pylint` not available in the environment.
settings.interpreter.description: When set to a path to python executable, extension will use that to launch the server and any subprocess.
settings.showNotifications.description: Controls when notifications are shown by this extension.
settings.showNotifications.off.descripti: All notifications are turned off, any errors or warning are still available in the logs.
settings.showNotifications.onError.descr: Notifications are shown only in the case of an error.
settings.showNotifications.onWarning.des: Notifications are shown for errors and warnings.
settings.showNotifications.always.descri: Notifications are show for anything that the server chooses to show.
settings.stdlibFiltering.description: Controls whether to filter out files from standard library from being linted.
